languages.text: "Твой совет выставил меня в дурном свете перед Администратумом. Надо было поступить с тассерцием по-другому".
"Your advice led to me appearing before the Administratum in an unfavourable light. We should have handled the thassertium situation differently."
languages.original_text: "Твой совет выставил меня в дурном свете перед Администратумом. Надо было поступить с тассерцием по-другому".

traits.locale_text: "Your advice led to me appearing before the Administratum in an unfavourable light. We should have handled the thassertium situation differently."
"Your advice led to me appearing before the Administratum in an unfavourable light. We should have handled the thassertium situation differently."
"Your advice led to me appearing before the Administratum in an unfavourable light. We should have handled the thassertium situation differently."
"Your advice led to me appearing before the Administratum in an unfavourable light. We should have handled the thassertium situation differently."
"Your advice led to me appearing before the Administratum in an unfavourable light. We should have handled the thassertium situation differently."
"Your advice led to me appearing before the Administratum in an unfavourable light. We should have handled the thassertium situation differently."

languages.text: 「君の助言のせいで、行政局に悪い印象を与えてしまった。タッセリウムの件は、別のやり方で処理すべきだったな」
languages.original_text: "Your advice led to me appearing before the Administratum in an unfavourable light. We should have handled the thassertium situation differently."

traits.locale_text: 「君の助言のせいで、行政局に悪い印象を与えてしまった。タッセリウムの件は、別のやり方で処理すべきだったな」

languages.text: "Euer Rat hat mich vor dem Administratum in einem ungünstigen Licht erscheinen lassen. Wir hätten das Thassertim-Problem anders lösen sollen."
languages.original_text: "Your advice led to me appearing before the Administratum in an unfavourable light. We should have handled the thassertium situation differently."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Rat hat mich vor dem Administratum in einem ungünstigen Licht erscheinen lassen. Wir hätten das Thassertim-Problem anders lösen sollen."

languages.text: « Vos conseils m'ont fait paraître sous un jour défavorable auprès de l'Administratum. Nous aurions dû aborder le sujet du thassertium différemment. »
languages.original_text: "Your advice led to me appearing before the Administratum in an unfavourable light. We should have handled the thassertium situation differently."

traits.locale_text: « Vos conseils m'ont fait paraître sous un jour défavorable auprès de l'Administratum. Nous aurions dû aborder le sujet du thassertium différemment. »

languages.text: «Su consejo me ha hecho quedar mal a ojos del Administratum. Deberíamos haber zanjado de otro modo el asunto del thassertio».
languages.original_text: "Your advice led to me appearing before the Administratum in an unfavourable light. We should have handled the thassertium situation differently."

traits.locale_text: «Su consejo me ha hecho quedar mal a ojos del Administratum. Deberíamos haber zanjado de otro modo el asunto del thassertio».

languages.text: “都是因为你的建议，我才让内政部给我留下了不好的印象。我们当初本该以别的方式处理当时的情况。”
languages.original_text: "Your advice led to me appearing before the Administratum in an unfavourable light. We should have handled the thassertium situation differently."

traits.locale_text: “都是因为你的建议，我才让内政部给我留下了不好的印象。我们当初本该以别的方式处理当时的情况。”

languages.text: "Tavsiyen yüzünden Administratum'un karşısında nahoş göründüm. Tasertiyum meselesini farklı bir şekilde ele almalıydık."
languages.original_text: "Your advice led to me appearing before the Administratum in an unfavourable light. We should have handled the thassertium situation differently."

traits.locale_text: "Tavsiyen yüzünden Administratum'un karşısında nahoş göründüm. Tasertiyum meselesini farklı bir şekilde ele almalıydık."
